thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Agfa Gevaert Siegwerk And Agfa Graphics Enter Into Alliance For Uv Digital Packaging Inks

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Agfa Gevaert Siegwerk And Agfa Graphics Enter Into Alliance For Uv Digital Packaging Inks

organizations.name: agfa graphics enter into alliance for uv digital packaging inks

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - AGFA GEVAERT NV:
* SIEGWERK AND AGFA GRAPHICS ENTER INTO STRATEGIC ALLIANCE FOR UV DIGITAL PACKAGING INKS
* PARTIES HAVE AGREED NOT TO DISCLOSE ANY FINANCIAL DETAILS
* ‍CONTRACT INCLUDES TRANSFER FROM AGFA TO SIEGWERK OF OEM CUSTOMER LIST, ACCESS TO KNOW-HOW, INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY AND SERVICES IN DOMAIN OF UV CURABLE DIGITAL INKJET INKS FOR SINGLE PASS PACKAGING AND LABELS INDUSTRY​ Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
